elements.name: updateSequenceNumber
elements.description: A number from 00001 to 99999 representing the sequence number of update action (each set of record identifiers $1 through $4) contained within a block

elements.name: isoCountryCode
elements.description: The International Organization for Standardization (ISO) country code representing the country where the firm is located for all countries except Canada. Valid ISO codes are listed in Appendix B of this publication.

elements.name: firmName
elements.description: A firm name can consist of up to 100 positions. The first 70 positions are reported on Record Identifier $2; the next 30 positions are reported on Record Identifier $3.
